definition: example/mirror/to view/reflection/to reflect/to inspect/to warn/(ancient bronze mirror)
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]
in view of this/to this end

sentences.english: And given those types of input, will get back output.
sentences.chinese: 然后鉴于输入类型返回结果输出。

sentences.english: On this one issue, it kind of punctured this whole section of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于此，这就像是在整个美国穿出一个孔。

sentences.english: Inview of the practical need of society, there are more and more people interested in learning English.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于社会的需要，愈来愈多人对学英语有兴趣。

sentences.english: In view of the development prospects of the Chinese market at present, he does some market research.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于目前中国市场的发展前景，他做了一个行销企划。

sentences.english: The Illinois stop was particularly important because of the primary calendar.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于初选日程安排，伊利诺伊州这一站尤显重要。

sentences.english: Due to its fatty acid profile the Gold formula can be considered closer to breast milk than goat formula.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于脂肪比例，金装佩方奶是比羊奶更接近母乳。

sentences.english: Respecting the above-mentioned facts,we wish to make the following proposals.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于上述情况，我们提出以下建议。

sentences.english: How should we live, in light of the facts about death?
sentences.chinese: 我们该如何活着，鉴于这些关于死亡的事实？

sentences.english: Due to its fatty acid profile, the Gold formula can be considered closer to breast milk than goat formula.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于脂肪比例，金装配方奶是比羊奶更接近母乳。

sentences.english: But I don't think so; in view of the fact I'm not quite surd.
sentences.chinese: 但不这样认为，鉴于事实说明，我不相信是这样。

sentences.english: But given the company's history of poor labor relations, one must wonder.
sentences.chinese: 但鉴于该公司劳资关系记录不佳，人们须有所怀疑。

sentences.english: In view of the age of the accused the magistrate give him a suspend sentence.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于被告的年龄，治安法官给他缓期处刑。

sentences.english: Remarkably few genuine flints exist, considering the vast scope of the story.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于故事涉及范围之广，只有极少的“弗林特”存在。

sentences.english: In view of the large amount involve in this transaction, we hope you'll agree to our request for installment payment.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于这笔交易数额较大，希望贵方能同意分期付款。

sentences.english: So the effectiveness evaluation of Range Gate Pull Off(RGPO)is studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于此，对距离波门拖引干扰效果评估进行了研究。

sentences.english: Seeing (that) he was badly ill, we sent for the doctor.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于他病情严重，我们派人去请医生去了。

definition: due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
to make clear/to make known/to state clearly/to indicate/known
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
from this, it can be seen that...
